import React from 'react' import {useState} from "react"; import {useNavigate} from 'react-router-dom' import {axios} from 'axios'; function Registration() { var navigate=useNavigate(); const [user,setUser] = useState({ username:"", enrollmentNo:"", Class:"", gender:"" }) const changeHandler=(e)=>{ const {name,value}=e.target; setUser({...user,[name]:value}); } const {username,enrollmentNo,Class,gender}=user const handleSubmit= (e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); axios.post("http://localhost:3003/users", user) .then((response)=>{ setUser(response.data); }) navigate("/showdata"); } return ( <>

Registration


) } export default Registration
